snippet: Penn State’s board of trustees met Friday and began to evaluate the recommendations in the university-commissioned report on the Jerry Sandusky scandal.
abstract: Penn State’s board of trustees meets to evaluate the recommendations in Louis J Freeh's blistering report on the Jerry Sandusky scandal.
lead_paragraph: Penn State’s board of trustees met Friday and began to evaluate the recommendations in the university-commissioned report on the Jerry Sandusky scandal.

headline.seo: Penn State Trustees Evaluate Freeh Report
headline.main: Penn State’s Board Takes First Step in the Wake of a Blistering Report
headline.print_headline: Penn State’s Trustees React to Blistering Report
